info.name: PetSathi API v1 - Complete QA Test Collection
info.description:
Comprehensive QA test collection for PetSathi/RESPAW Backend API.
Covers all 73 endpoints across 8 modules: Auth, Pets, SOS, Incidents, Vets, Guides, Blog, Community.

Test Flow:
1. Register & Login to get token
2. Set {{auth_token}} variable
3. Run tests sequentially per folder

Environment Variables Required:
- base_url: http://localhost:8000/api/v1
- auth_token: (auto-set after login)
- admin_token: (auto-set after admin login)
